attributes.action: Provide a link on this website to view similar 'live' petitions to those that have been rejected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a petition is rejected for being similar or overlapping and existing petition, a link to that petition should be provided so we dont have to sift though thousands of petitions looking for the one we want

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
